T02D3090:187a-0: @187a * // pha rol gyi dmag dpung gzhom par 'dod na /
T02D3090:187a-1: bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas 'khrul 'khor mu khyud gnyis pa snga ma ltar ram /
T02D3090:187a-2: ras dmar po lta bu la bris pa'i mthar che ge mo'i tshogs dang /
T02D3090:187a-3: de dag gi srung ma'i ming gi mthar bandrha ya
T02D3090:187a-4: nan bya ba bris nas phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de'i
T02D3090:187a-5: srung ma dang / dmag dpung rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bkug nas bstims te /
T02D3090:187b-0: @187b bcings nas 'thab mtshams su snga ma ltar gnan par bya'o //
T02D3090:187b-1: yang na pha rol gyi dmag 'ong ba la de
T02D3090:187b-2: bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar
T02D3090:187b-3: mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs rgyal mtshan
T02D3090:187b-4: gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro dang mchod
T02D3090:187b-5: pa bya ste / grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo'am /
T02D3090:187b-9: dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so //
T02D3090:187b-10: yang na rin po che'i byang bu'am /
T02D3090:187b-12: shog bu la gzungs 'di bris te /
T02D3090:187b-13: lhar bskyed cing spyan drang ba dang /
T02D3090:187b-14: mchod pa chen po byas nas bskor bar byas /
T02D3090:187b-15: tshangs pa dang dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa la gtang ngo //
T02D3090:187b-16: che ge mo'i dmag dpung choms shig pa zhes pas kyang bskul te /
T02D3090:187b-17: de ltar gzungs du mar bris te /
T02D3090:187b-18: spyi gtsug tu gdags pa dang /
T02D3090:187b-19: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te /
T02D3090:187b-20: dmag dpung gi mdun du bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du bya ste /
T02D3090:187b-21: nga rgyal dang ldan pa phyag rgya'i tshogs dang /
T02D3090:187b-22: tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pas bskor te /
T02D3090:187b-23: gnas par bsams shing phyar te 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D3090:187b-24: rtag tu mchod cing gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D3090:187b-25: des ni pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
